resources.string: George was trying to get a small nap as he couldnt sleep last night analyzing the key points of his last case.Suddenly he gets a text message with number saying "Hallo! Scene: Murder; " EA.EDA , -(A=2?100:0).BAA ". George knew that he cannot sleep anymore and he left the office assuming he is on his new case
While Driving the car to the location George was thinking, is this really happening? Suddenly his map in his mobile displayed "Location Reached"
How George correctly guessed the location of Murder spot? What is it?

So now George reached the location of Murder, As soon as he reached the crime scene he notice something strange, he was looking at the body of a girl which is lying on the ground with right hand horizontally and left hand vertically. In her right hand there is one note which has written
George saw this coming, Killer is giving clues after murder, he knew he had to rush before the other one gets killed, Where is he heading now?

He reached the place, but it was too late. George wondered Today is not a good day for him. While talking to police he noticed the body lying straight with both hands up.He was still looking at the body suddenly one police came and handed over the Mobile which he found near body!
When George opened the mobile it was locked, with 5 digit passcode, he just thought about all the murder scenes and locations and input the numbers. Phone Unlocked, What is the passcode?
